mapper.select: select t.ds_id, t.p_ds_id, t.ds_name, t.ds_category, case when a.ds_name is null then 'Y' else 'N' end is_leaf, t.status from tool_cq_ds t left join tool_cq_ds a on t.p_ds_id = a.ds_id where 1=1 order by t.ds_id
select t.ds_id, t.p_ds_id, t.ds_name, t.ds_category, t.status from tool_cq_ds t where t.ds_id =#{ds_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tool_cq_ds(ds_id, p_ds_id, ds_name, ds_category, status) values(#{ds_id}, #{p_ds_id}, #{ds_name}, #{ds_category}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tool_cq_ds set p_ds_id = #{p_ds_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ds_name = #{ds_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ds_category = #{ds_category,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, ds_sql = #{ds_sql,jdbcType=CLOB} where ds_id = #{ds_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: select post_id as id_field,post_desc as value_field from sys_post_info
select role_id as id_field,role_name as value_field from sys_role_info
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name from sys_user_info where user_id in (select user_id from tool_cq_user_ds where ds_id = #{ds_id})
mapper.delete: delete from tool_cq_user_ds where ds_id = #{ds_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select t.ds_id, t.p_ds_id, t.ds_name, t.ds_category, t.status from tool_cq_ds t where 1=1 and t.ds_category = '0' union select t.ds_id, t.p_ds_id, t.ds_name, t.ds_category, t.status from tool_cq_ds t, tool_cq_user_ds a where 1=1 and t.ds_id = a.ds_id and a.user_id = #{userId} and t.ds_category = '1' order by ds_id
select t.ds_id, t.p_ds_id, t.ds_name, t.ds_category, t.status, t.ds_sql from tool_cq_ds t where 1=1 and t.ds_id =#{dsId}
select s.dim_cd, s.is_tree, s.code_col_name, s.label_col_name from upp_dim_source s where s.dim_cd in (select dim_cd from tool_cq_ds_meta where ds_id = #{dsId} and dim_cd is not null)
